info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:20PM CDT until July 08 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR BOND...NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE AND SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 820 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ramsey to near Van Burensburg to near Reno, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Ramsey and Mulberry Grove around 825 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Vandalia and Beaver Creek. This also includes Ramsey Lake State Park. This includes Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 41 and 63. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
